001package org.relationlearn.util.io;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.util.HashMap;
006import java.util.Map;
007import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
008import javax.xml.parsers.SAXParser;
009import javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory;
010import org.relationlearn.exception.AlreadyExistingNodeException;
011import org.relationlearn.model.ArgumentNode;
012import org.relationlearn.model.ArgumentRelation;
013import org.relationlearn.model.DigraphImpl;
014import org.relationlearn.model.NodeImpl;
015import org.relationlearn.model.RelationDigraph;
016import org.relationlearn.model.RelationImpl;
017import org.relationlearn.util.RelationType;
018import org.xml.sax.Attributes;
019import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
020import org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler;
021
022/**
023 * InputParser implementation that parser and XML file written in the
024 * <a href="http://www-sop.inria.fr/NoDE/NoDE-xml.html">NoDE</a> format, using
025 * a SAX based parser.
026 * 
027 * @see InputParser
028 * @see javax.xml.parsers.SAXParser
029 */
030public class XMLFileParser implements InputParser {
031    
032    private static class NodeBuilder {
033        
034        public int nodeId;
035        public int nodeWeight;
036        public String nodeText;
037        
038        public ArgumentNode build() {
039            return new NodeImpl(nodeId, nodeWeight, nodeText);
040        }
041    }
042    
043    private static class RelationBuilder {
044        
045        public int relationId;
046        public ArgumentNode aNode;
047        public ArgumentNode tNode;
048        public RelationType relType;
049        
050        public ArgumentRelation build() {
051            return new RelationImpl(relationId, aNode, tNode, relType);
052        }
053    }
054    
055    private static class SAXParserHelper extends DefaultHandler {
056        
057        private final String ENTL_TAG = "entailment-corpus";
058        private final String PAIR_TAG = "pair";
059        private final String TARGET_TAG = "h";
060        private final String RESPONSE_TAG = "t";
061        
062        private final String ID_ATTR = "id";
063        private final String WEIGHT_ATTR = "weight";
064        private final String TOPIC_ATTR = "topic";
065        private final String ENTL_ATTR = "entailment";
066        
067        private final String VALUE_NO = "NO";
068        private final String VALUE_YES = "YES";
069        
070        private final Map<String, RelationDigraph> relGraph;
071        
072        // Variables used to build the graph nodes while parsing the file
073        private String currentGraph;
074        
075        private RelationBuilder currentRelation;
076        
077        private boolean buildArgumentator;
078        private boolean buildTarget;
079        
080        private NodeBuilder currentArgumentator;
081        private NodeBuilder currentTarget;
082        
083        private String tempString;
084        
085        public SAXParserHelper() {
086            this.relGraph = new HashMap<>();
087        }
088        
089        @Override
090        public void startElement(String uri, String localName, String qName, 
091                Attributes attributes) throws SAXException {
092            String strId = attributes.getValue(ID_ATTR);
093            int nId;
094            if(!ENTL_TAG.equals(qName) && (strId != null)) switch(qName) {
095                case PAIR_TAG:
096                    currentGraph = attributes.getValue(TOPIC_ATTR);
097                    if(currentGraph != null) {
098                        if(!relGraph.containsKey(currentGraph)) {
099                            relGraph.put(currentGraph, new DigraphImpl());
100                        }
101                        parseRelation(attributes);
102                    } else {
103                        throw new SAXException("topic attribute is mandatory "
104                                + "for the pair tag");
105                    }
106                    break;
107                case TARGET_TAG:
108                    nId = Integer.parseInt(strId);
109                    if(relGraph.get(currentGraph).containsNode(nId)) {
110                        buildTarget = false;
111                        currentRelation.tNode = 
112                                relGraph.get(currentGraph).getArgumentNode(nId);
113                    } else {
114                        buildTarget = true;
115                        currentTarget = new NodeBuilder();
116                        parseNode(attributes, currentTarget);
117                    }
118                    break;
119                case RESPONSE_TAG:
120                    nId = Integer.parseInt(strId);
121                    if(relGraph.get(currentGraph).containsNode(nId)) {
122                        buildArgumentator = false;
123                        currentRelation.aNode = 
124                                relGraph.get(currentGraph).getArgumentNode(nId);
125                    } else {
126                        buildArgumentator = true;
127                        currentArgumentator = new NodeBuilder();
128                        parseNode(attributes, currentArgumentator);
129                    }
130                    break;
131                default: // Other XML tags are ignored
132                    break;
133            } else {
134                if(!ENTL_TAG.equals(qName)) {
135                    throw new SAXException("id attribute is mandatory for "
136                        + "the pair, t and h tags");
137                }
138            }
139        }
140        
141        @Override
142        public void characters(char[] ac, int i, int j) {
143            tempString = new String(ac, i, j);
144        }
145        
146        @Override
147        public void endElement(String uri, String localName, String qName) {
148            switch(qName) {
149                case PAIR_TAG:
150                    ArgumentRelation ar;
151                    ArgumentNode argumentator;
152                    ArgumentNode target;
153                    RelationDigraph graph = relGraph.get(currentGraph);
154                    try {
155                        if(buildArgumentator) {
156                            argumentator = currentArgumentator.build();
157                            graph.addArgumentNode(argumentator);
158                            currentRelation.aNode = argumentator;
159                        } else {
160                            argumentator = currentRelation.aNode;
161                        }
162                        if(buildTarget) {
163                            target = currentTarget.build();
164                            graph.addArgumentNode(target);
165                            currentRelation.tNode = target;
166                        } else {
167                            target = currentRelation.tNode;
168                        }
169                        ar = currentRelation.build();
170                        argumentator.addTargetRelation(ar);
171                        target.addReplyRelation(ar);
172                    } catch (AlreadyExistingNodeException aenex) {
173                        System.err.println("Error already existing node");
174                    }
175                    currentRelation = null;
176                    currentArgumentator = currentTarget = null;
177                    break;
178                case TARGET_TAG:
179                    if(buildTarget) {
180                        currentTarget.nodeText = tempString;
181                    }
182                    break;
183                case RESPONSE_TAG:
184                    if(buildArgumentator) {
185                        currentArgumentator.nodeText = tempString;
186                    }
187                    break;
188                default: // Other XML tags are ignored
189                    break;
190            }
191        }
192        
193        public Map<String, RelationDigraph> getParsingResults() {
194            return this.relGraph;
195        }
196        
197        private void parseRelation(Attributes attr) {
198            currentRelation = new RelationBuilder();
199            currentRelation.relationId = 
200                    Integer.parseInt(attr.getValue(ID_ATTR));
201            String entailment = attr.getValue(ENTL_ATTR);
202            if(null != entailment) switch (entailment) {
203                case VALUE_YES:
204                    currentRelation.relType = RelationType.SUPPORT;
205                    break;
206                case VALUE_NO:
207                    currentRelation.relType = RelationType.ATTACK;
208                    break;
209                default:
210                    currentRelation.relType = RelationType.UNKNOWN;
211                    break;
212            } else {
213                currentRelation.relType = RelationType.UNKNOWN;
214            }
215        }
216        
217        private void parseNode(Attributes attr, NodeBuilder nb) {
218            nb.nodeId = Integer.parseInt(attr.getValue(ID_ATTR));
219            String weight = attr.getValue(WEIGHT_ATTR);
220            if(weight == null) {
221                nb.nodeWeight = 1;
222            } else {
223                nb.nodeWeight = Integer.parseInt(attr.getValue(WEIGHT_ATTR));
224            }
225        }
226    }
227    
228    /**
229     * Parses a given XML file and returns a Map containing all RelationDigraph
230     * objects found in it.
231     * 
232     * @param uri the path of the XML file to parse
233     * @return a Map with all RelationDigraph objects parsed from the file
234     * 
235     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the path doesn't correspond to a 
236     * valid XML file.
237     */
238    @Override
239    public Map<String, RelationDigraph> parseInput(String uri) {
240        File input = new File(uri);
241        if(input.canRead()) { // ADD FILE EXTENSION CHECK
242            return parseFile(input);
243        } else {
244            throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI doens't "
245                    + "correspond to a valid file path");
246        }
247    }
248    
249    private Map<String, RelationDigraph> parseFile(File input) {
250        SAXParserFactory factory = SAXParserFactory.newInstance();
251        SAXParserHelper helper = new SAXParserHelper();
252        try {
253            SAXParser parser = factory.newSAXParser();
254            parser.parse(input, helper);
255        } catch (ParserConfigurationException pcex) { //ADD CLEARER EXCEPTION 
256            System.err.println("Parser config exception: " + pcex.getMessage());
257        } catch (SAXException saex) {
258            System.err.println("SAX Exception: " + saex.getMessage());
259        } catch (IOException ioex) {
260            System.err.println("IO Exception: " + ioex.getMessage());
261        }
262        return helper.getParsingResults();
263    }
264
265}
